messages: @alltimelaauuu I really want to meet them, I hope they tour in the US in the fall. This time in NYC.
@alltimelaauuu I really want to meet them, I hope they tour in the US in the fall. This time in NYC.
@alltimehay @riandawson HE WAS THE LAST ONE I NEEDED TO TWEET ME I AM CRYING SO MUCH.
Every time it snows or its bitterly cold, I always think, "What's my brother doing in fucking California, working at fucking Disneyland?"
